item.description:
Last Event for Mass Networking in Framingham at British Beer Company until September

*Come Meet and Network with Other Professionals in Framingham*

             (80 Expected and Could go over 100 This Month)

  Bring business cards, a smile, and a professional attitude because it's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013. Dress code is business casual

  (Appetizers, Plenty of Parking, and Team Trivia after Networking)

                         [Over 100 Beers and 36 Drafts]

  Advance Tickets Start at $5 and $10 Cash at the door if Available!
         Get Tix Now: http://massnetworking0513.eventbrite.com

  *Doing a Charity Raffle with chance to Win 2 Theatre Tickets, A Membership for Barter Connections(Valued at $395), Restaurant Certificates and more! Proceeds going to Sandy Hook and are $5/entry*

  Raffles are Sponsored by http://BestNetShopping.com (Over 4000 Stores/Websites like Groupon, Sears, Pet Smart, Lowes, Home Depot, Angie's List and more with up to 50% Cash Back on Purchases) & http://Website-Business-Solutions.com (Up to 75% off on Top Notch Websites with E-Commerce and SEO)

                          *Check them out and Save!*
item.name: Last 2nd Monday Framingham of the Season (80+ Expected)
